extendedInfo.description: The Space Monkeys are lost and cant find their way back. Solve the puzzle by guiding the monkeys to the right goal in order to help them back home. Block / unblock the monkeys to find the correct solution.Space Monkeys is a new style block puzzle game where you have to move the monkeys to the right goal. The game is a real brain teaser that will challenge your logic skills and patience. How to play:All monkeys must stand on their respective target to solve the puzzle. You solve the puzzle by moving the monkeys one at a time and using them to block / unblock each other. When moving a monkey it will keep walking until reaching an obstruction (other monkey, wall, stone or hole). Though, a monkey is placed on its goal you can still move it using it to block other monkeys which is needed to solve the puzzle.Space Monkeys features:- Unique puzzle game- More than 55 challenging levels- Puzzles with 2, 3 and 4 monkeys.** Mail from user **Cool puzzle. In some ways a bit like quell reflect or greedy spiders and cut the rope. Hours of fun. Really like the levels with 4 monkeys.If you would like to see this game translated in your language, please email us at support@flisko.com.If you experience any technical issues, please contact us at support@flisko.com. Please include app name, version, device information and screenshot if possible. Like us on Facebook to get exclusive news!!http://www.facebook.com/fliskoappsKeywords:Puzzle, logic, brain, block, zen puzzle, quell, mensa, hallenge, difficult,  block, ingenious, move, box,  tangram, sliding puzzle, unblock, mouse, link, maze, libgdx

reviews.title: Nice but needs expansion
reviews.comment: Nice simple idea but quickly gets tiresome as there is no advancement mechanism. Just more and more of the same and ads after every level.

reviews.title: Classic brainy fun
reviews.comment: This game is challenging enough to get the ol\' brain juices flowing, but nothing so hard that it makes me try to break my phone and yell at my mom, which is always a good thing. The only reason why I wont give it a higher rating is because the animations and graphics are lacking a bit. The monkeys should atleast have hair like they do in the sample pics.

reviews.title: Broken w/no support.
reviews.comment: Level 3 defect as encountered by others.  Support email listed on developer\'s web site bounces.  Combine the above with the elevated permissions the app wants, and it leaves me with a bad feeling.  I\'m uninstalling it, but if the app is nefarious, it\'s probably too late.
